title: N.J. judge orders lawyer, two others to pay $14 million for defrauding elderly investors
text:
Published By: Philly Business - Today 
A New Jersey Superior court judge ordered suspended lawyer Michael Kwasnik and two others to pay $14 million in restitution for running a Po...
